places_to_visit.name: Golden Circle
places_to_visit.description: The Golden Circle is a popular tourist route that includes Thingvellir National Park, the Gullfoss Waterfall, and the Geysir Geothermal Area. It offers stunning landscapes and geothermal features.

places_to_visit.name: Blue Lagoon
places_to_visit.description: The Blue Lagoon is a geothermal spa located in a lava field. It’s known for its milky-blue waters and soothing properties, making it a perfect spot for relaxation.

places_to_visit.name: Hallgrímskirkja
places_to_visit.description: Hallgrímskirkja is a striking Lutheran church in Reykjavik. Its unique architecture and panoramic views from the top make it a must-visit landmark.

places_to_visit.name: Harpa Concert Hall
places_to_visit.description: Harpa Concert Hall is an architectural marvel with its glass facade that reflects the Icelandic landscape. It hosts concerts and cultural events.

places_to_visit.name: Perlan
places_to_visit.description: Perlan is a landmark in Reykjavik that features a rotating observation deck, a glacier exhibition, and an indoor ice cave. It offers panoramic views of the city and surrounding landscapes.
